PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.TITLE: Welcome to the Psychologist Interface!
PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.SUBTITLE: Manage your patients, sessions and get access to tools to enhance your professional work.
PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.DASHBOARD_DESC: View statistics, schedules, and the overall status of your patients and sessions.
PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.PATIENTS_DESC: Access and manage your patients' profiles, progress, and session history.
PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.SESSIONS_DESC: Manage and organize your sessions effectively and keep track of your patients' progress.
PSYCHOLOGIST_HOME.MESSAGE: Ready to start? Use the sidebar to navigate through the different sections and bring the best support for your patients.

STUDENT_HOME.TITLE: Welcome to PsychoHealth!
STUDENT_HOME.SUBTITLE: Discover your potential and find the career that suits you best.
STUDENT_HOME.DASHBOARD_DESC: View your progress, completed tests, and recommended careers based on your results.
STUDENT_HOME.TESTS_DESC: Take tests to discover your interests, aptitudes, and personality traits.
STUDENT_HOME.SESSIONS_DESC: Schedule and manage your sessions with psychologists for personalized guidance.
STUDENT_HOME.MESSAGE: Ready to start? Use the sidebar to navigate through the different sections and take the first step towards your future.
